Title: Evoking the Forge
Description:
Harumph! This blasted forge is on its last legs. We'd repair it, but Stonemason Itsak picked up a shift at Ironhaul Station when the Coreway collapsed, and well...

There's no one to fix it anymore.

If you can figure out a way of getting it running hot again, Gundargaz would be in your debt!
ObjectivesText: Find a way to stoke the forge outside of Gundargaz.

Objectives.Text: Stoke the Forge with Fire Breath
